responseText: NSLOCTEXT("", "CECCE4ED4981630F1FEB13A9F7081F91", "A relic of the Harbinger Apocalypse and tool of destruction. It can be found within the ruins of Wrathwatch. Seek those such as you, a knight and a minstrel. They share your will to possess such power. But beware, the power can consume as it has in the past. Beware! I converse no longer.")
name: MIDD_0003_RRR_WrathWatcher_6
